addStakableToken(address,uint256).details: add a stackable contract address, along with its reward per block

balanceOf(address,address).details: get the user staked amount in a particular token

returns._0: the amount of `token` that the `user` has currently staked

deposit(address,uint256).details: deposit an allowed token amount into staking contract

getPoolSize(address).details: get the pool size in a particular token

returns._0: total amount of `tokenAddress` that was locked

getTotalReward(address).details: get total accrued interests for caller

params._startTime: date and time to have staking contract working
params._withdrawBuffer: blocks number to lock deposit / withdraw operations

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeStakableToken(address).details: remove a stacked contract address, along with its reward per block

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: withdraw amount of allowed token from staking contract, checking if a withdrawBuffer number blocks has passed
